title: Unable to access dashboard
creator: John Smith
description: User is unable to access the dashboard after logging in.

comments.author: Jane Doe
comments.text: Can you provide more details about the issue?

comments.author: John Smith
comments.text: Sure, I get a 404 error when I try to access the dashboard.

title: Login issue after password reset
creator: Alice Johnson
description: User cannot log in after resetting the password.

comments.author: Bob Wilson
comments.text: Have you tried clearing your browser cache?

comments.author: Alice Johnson
comments.text: Yes, but it didn't help.

title: Need help with API integration
creator: Mike Anderson
description: User needs assistance with integrating the API.

title: Update payment gateway configuration
creator: Sarah Parker
description: User requested an update to the payment gateway configuration.

comments.author: Bob Wilson
comments.text: The payment gateway configuration has been updated.

comments.author: Sarah Parker
comments.text: Thank you!

title: Error 404 on product page
creator: David Brown
description: User reports a 404 error on the product page.

comments.author: Alice Johnson
comments.text: Can you provide the URL of the product page?

comments.author: David Brown
comments.text: Sure, it's https://example.com/product/123

comments.text: We are looking into the issue.

comments.author: Emma White
comments.text: Thank you for the update.
